amendment.description: To add a provision relating to financial assurances.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1244 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1244 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Blunt. (consideration: CR S6512; text: CR S6512) To add a provision relating to financial assurances.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1244 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Blunt.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1244 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
